name: Joker Poker - Video Poker
description:
Play "Joker Poker" and test your skills on your favorite Video Poker game. It's like having a small slice of Las Vegas on your computer.

Excactly what the name says, Joker Poker. Nothing else.
The aim of the game is to build the best possible poker hand. The game is won if the player's hand contains at least a pair of Kings or a King and a Joker. At first you are dealt five cards, you then choose which to hold on to before discarding and replacing the others. You are then paid depending on the strength of your hand.

All the basic rules of poker are adhered here and the maximum win is 4000 coins for Natural Royal Flush (No jokers).

It is played with a standard deck, and one joker is are included as wild card.

Enjoy the Casino Experience!

  • Simple and clean design
  • Fast and easy game play
  • Gamble your winnings
  • View statistics
  • Climb the Leaderboard and earn bragging rights

This game does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win or lose real money.
